Text:
Audio 8 Video 8

Being a 720p release i would say the quality was too pixelated esp in the dark/space scenes, but regarding the relatively small filesize its maybe to be expected.   If you dont want to risk being annoyed, go for a bigger release...

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5128929/Battlestar.Galactica.The.Plan.720p.BluRay.x264-SiNNERS

(sorry cgaurav007, but thanks for the effort :)

-Relevant and some would maybe say needed addition to the BSG saga, but personally I wont recommend watching this without seeing the whole series first, which i would highly recommend to anyone...     

-So say we all 

8)
I downloaded a different version, but the movie itself is disappointing (even though I enjoyed the series). Unless you are a freak fan, not worth watching.
